465:1: atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputro bhagavato'ntikādidamevaṃrūpamupāyakauśalyajñānadarśanaṃ saṃdhābhāṣitanirdeśaṃ śrutvā eṣāṃ ca mahāśrāvakāṇāṃ vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā imāṃ ca pūrvayogapratisaṃyuktāṃ kathāṃ śrutvā imāṃ ca bhagavato vṛṣabhatāṃ śrutvā āścaryaprāpto'bhūdadbhutaprāpto'bhūnnirāmiṣeṇa ca cittena prītiprāmodyena sphuṭo'bhūt|
465:2: mahatā ca prītiprāmodyena mahatā ca dharmagauraveṇa utthāyāsanād bhagavataścaraṇayoḥ praṇipatya evaṃ cittamutpāditavān-āścaryaṃ bhagavan,
465:9: tathāgata evāsmākaṃ jānīte āśayaṃ pūrvayogacaryāṃ ca|
465:10: sa bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte sthito'bhūd bhagavantameva namaskurvan animiṣābhyāṃ ca netrābhyāṃ saṃprekṣamāṇaḥ||
465:11: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaḥ pūrṇasya maitrāyaṇīputrasya cittāśayamavalokya sarvāvantaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamāmantrayate sma-paśyatha bhikṣavo yūyamimaṃ śrāvakaṃ pūrṇaṃ maitrāyaṇīputraṃ yo mayāsya bhikṣusaṃghasya dharmakathikānāmagryo nirdiṣṭaḥ,
465:14: catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ saṃharṣakaḥ samādāpakaḥ samuttejakaḥ saṃpraharṣako'klānto dharmadeśanayā,
465:17: muktvā bhikṣavastathāgataṃ nānyaḥ śaktaḥ pūrṇaṃ maitrāyaṇīputramarthato vā vyañjanato vā paryādātum|
465:18: tatkiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo mamaivāyaṃ saddharmaparigrāhaka iti?
465:22: yatra anenaiva teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śāsane saddharmaḥ parigṛhītaḥ|
465:23: tadyathāpi nāma mama etarhi sarvatra cāgryo dharmakathikānāmabhūt,
465:28: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śāsane yāvadāyuṣpramāṇaṃ brahmacaryaṃ caritavān|
465:29: sarvatra ca śrāvaka iti saṃjñāyate sma|
465:35: eṣāmapi bhikṣavo vipaśyipramukhānāṃ saptānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ yeṣāmahaṃ saptamaḥ,
465:37: yadapi tadbhikṣavo bhaviṣyatyanāgate'dhvani asmin bhadrakalpe caturbhirbuddhairūnaṃ buddhasahasram,
465:38: teṣāmapi śāsane eṣa eva pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputro'gryo dharmakathikānāṃ bhaviṣyati,
465:44: sa imāmevaṃrūpāṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ paripūrya aprameyairasaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpairanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate|
465:45: dharmaprabhāso nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyati vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān|
465:47: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena gaṅgānadīvālukopamāstrisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātava ekaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati|
465:48: samaṃ pāṇitalajātaṃ saptaratnamayamapagataparvataṃ saptaratnamayaiḥ kūṭāgāraiḥ paripūrṇaṃ bhaviṣyati|
465:52: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena idaṃ buddhakṣetramapagatapāpaṃ bhaviṣyati apagatamātṛgrāmaṃ ca|
465:53: sarve ca te sattvā aupapādukā bhaviṣyanti brahmacāriṇo manomayairātmabhāvaiḥ svayaṃprabhā ṛddhimanto vaihāyasaṃgamā vīryavantaḥ smṛtimantaḥ prajñāvantaḥ suvarṇavarṇaiḥ samucchrayairdvātriṃśadbhirmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtavigrahāḥ|
465:54: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena tasmin buddhakṣetre teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ dvāvāhārau bhaviṣyataḥ|
465:57: aprameyāṇi cāsaṃkhyeyāni bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi bhaviṣyanti sarveṣāṃ ca mahābhijñāprāptānāṃ pratisaṃvidgatiṃgatānāṃ sattvāvavādakuśalānām|
465:58: gaṇanāsamatikrāntāścāsya śrāvakā bhaviṣyanti maharddhikā mahānubhāvā aṣṭavimokṣadhyāyinaḥ|
465:63: parinirvṛtasya ca tasya bhagavato dharmaprabhāsasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya saddharmaścirasthāyī bhaviṣyati|
465:64: ratnamayaiśca stūpaiḥ sā lokadhātuḥ sphuṭā bhaviṣyati|
465:78: evaṃ ca bhāṣanti vayaṃ hi śrāvakā
465:148: atha khalu teṣāṃ dvādaśānāṃ vaśībhūtaśatānāmetadabhavat-āścaryaprāpta sma,
465:152: atha khalu bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ mahāśrāvakāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ mahākāśyapamāmantrayate sma-imāni kāśyapa dvādaśa vaśībhūtaśatāni,
465:155: tatra kāśyapa kauṇḍinyo bhikṣurmahāśrāvako dvāṣaṣṭīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ pareṇa parataraṃ samantaprabhāso nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyati,
465:156: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān|
465:157: tatra kāśyapa anenaikena nāmadheyena pañca tathāgataśatāni bhaviṣyanti|
465:160: tadyathā gayākāśyapo nadīkāśyapaḥ urubilvakāśyapaḥ kālaḥ kālodāyī aniruddho revataḥ kapphiṇo bakkulaścundaḥ svāgataḥ ityevaṃpramukhāni pañca vaśībhūtaśatāni||
465:161: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
465:214: atha khalu tāni pañcārhacchatāni bhagavataḥ saṃmukhamātmano vyākaraṇāni śrutvā tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanasa pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ|
465:215: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādayoḥ śirobhirnipatya evamāhuḥ-atyayaṃ vayaṃ bhagavan deśayāmo yairasmābhirbhagavannevaṃ satatasamitaṃ cittaṃ paribhāvitam-idamasmākaṃ parinirvāṇam|
465:219: yairnāma asmābhirbhagavaṃstathāgatajñāne'bhisaṃboddhavye evaṃrūpeṇa parīttena jñānena paritoṣaṃ gatāḥ sma|
465:220: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan kasyacideva puruṣasya kaṃcideva mitragṛhaṃ praviṣṭasya mattasya vā suptasya vā sa mitro'narghamaṇiratnaṃ vastrānte badhnīyāt-asyedaṃ maṇiratnaṃ bhavatviti|
465:221: atha khalu bhagavan sa puruṣa utthāyāsanāt prakāmet|
465:225: mahatā ca vyāyāmena kathaṃcit kaṃcidāhāraṃ pratilabheta|
465:227: atha khalu bhagavaṃstasya puruṣasya sa purāṇamitraḥ puruṣo yena tasya tadanargheyaṃ maṇiratnaṃ vastrānte baddham,
465:229: tamevaṃ vadet-kiṃ tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa kṛcchramāpadyase āhāracīvaraparyeṣṭihetoḥ,
465:230: yadā yāvad bhoḥ puruṣa mayā tava sukhavihārārthaṃ sarvakāmanivartakamanargheyaṃ maṇiratnaṃ vastrānte upanibaddham|
465:233: na ca nāma tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa pratyavekṣase-kiṃ mama baddhaṃ yena vā baddhaṃ ko hetuḥ kiṃnidānaṃ vā baddhametat?
465:234: bālajātīyastvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa yastvaṃ kṛcchreṇa āhāracīvaraṃ paryeṣamāṇastuṣṭimāpadyase|
465:235: gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa etanmaṇiratnaṃ grahāya mahānagaraṃ gatvā parivartayastva|
465:236: tena ca dhanena sarvāṇi dhanakaraṇīyāni kuruṣveti||
465:237: evameva bhagavan asmākamapi tathāgatena pūrvameva bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā sarvajñatācittānyutpāditānyabhūvan|
465:238: tāni ca vayaṃ bhagavan na jānīmo na budhyāmahe|
465:239: te vayaṃ bhagavan arhadbhūmau nirvṛtāḥ sma iti saṃjānīmaḥ|
465:241: yadvayaṃ bhagavan evaṃ parīttena jñānena paritoṣamāpadyāmaḥ|
465:243: te vayaṃ bhagavaṃstathāgatena saṃbodhyamānāḥ-mā yūyaṃ bhikṣava etannirvāṇaṃ manyadhvam|
465:244: saṃvidyante bhikṣavo yuṣmākaṃ saṃtāne kuśalamūlāni yāni mayā pūrvaṃ paripācitāni|
465:245: etarhi ca mamaivedamupāyakauśalyaṃ dharmadeśanābhilāpena yad yūyametarhi nirvāṇamiti manyadhve|
465:246: evaṃ ca vayaṃ bhagavatā saṃbodhayitvā adyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtāḥ||
465:247: atha khalu tāni pañca vaśībhūtaśatānyājñātakauṇḍinyapramukhāni tasyāṃ velāyamimā gāthā abhāṣanta—
465:270: taṃ cāpi ratnaṃ hi bhaveta vismṛtaṃ
